Special Powers
FOLDING SPACE AROUND YOU: Passenger: 2, Phasing/Teleport, Stealth. When Manifold uses Phasing/Teleport, after resolutions you may choose a character whose square he moved through. That character can't use improved abilities until your next turn.
POSITIONAL AWARENESS: Combat Reflexes, Willpower. // Adjacent friendly characters can use Combat Reflexes.
